name: Minimum Common API
description: The minimal collection of Web Platform APIs that ought to be implemented by Web-interoperable runtimes.

name: Web Crypto Streams
description: A proposal to define streaming support in the Web Crypto API.

name: Performance
description: The performance workstream is concerned with cross environment performance measurement.

name: Runtime Keys
description: A proposal defining standard identifier keys for various runtime environments.

name: Fetch
description: A fork of the WHATWG Fetch to make the upstream specification more suitable for server-side JavaScript environments.

name: Sockets API
description: A proposal incubating an API for establishing TCP connections in non-browser JavaScript environments.

name: CLI API
description: A proposal standardizing common CLI APIs such as argv and environment variables.
